long_description: The K2 Comp ski poles are lightweight, durable and a great value for skiers looking for composite poles. Composite fiberglass construction aligns all fibers in shaft for optimal strength and durability. Rubber overmolded grips are comfortable in hand. Small baskets work well in most snow conditions, especially hardpack. The K2 Comp ski poles feature adjustable wrist straps.
short_description: The K2 Comp ski poles are lightweight, durable and a great value for skiers looking for composite poles.
